title: Hot Fun In the Summertime
description: Seven very different singles – four women and three men – rent a New Jersey beach house for the author Shontae Nichols, self-employed accountant and realtor Linda Harris, Linda’s sister, hip-hop video dancer Kinnik Watkins, cosmetologist Jovita Blassingame, Calculus professor Curtis “Doc” Whetstone, actor and drama instructor Kip Lee, and new housemate, up and coming film actor Devon Burke. During their two-month stay, romances bloom friendships are tested and when a tragedy strikes one of the housemates, they all learn the answer to the age-old Can men and women ever be just friends?
author: Chicki Brown
